mapper.insert: insert into vendor_table(vendorId, vendorPassword, vendorName, vendorEmail, vendorMobile, vendorFileName) values (#{vendorId}, #{vendorPassword}, #{vendorName}, #{vendorEmail}, #{vendorMobile}, #{vendorFileName})
mapper.select: select * from vendor_table where vendorId=#{vendorId} and vendorPassword=#{vendorPassword}
mapper.update: update vendor_table set vendorName=#{vendorName}, vendorEmail=#{vendorEmail}, vendorMobile=#{vendorMobile} where id=#{id}
update vendor_table set vendorPoint=vendorPoint+#{productPrice} where vendorId=#{vendorId};
